Great fabric and design, they feel high end. Color looks just like the picture. BUT tailoring work showed otherwise. Both shoulder piece keep riding up like I wear a wrong size because the stitching is not deep enough in the armpits area (causing extra fabric around shoulders). My grandma used to be a tailor and this is the first thing I noticed after learning from her. Mine is so bad that it makes my shoulders look so boxy even when I sit down. I dont see that as obvious with other people in the comment session. Wonder if I got a defect one.

The third picture where my midsection is more open is the Anrabess. I both in XXL and ivory to comparison shop. The Anrabess was smaller and the color was a “blush” not ivory. Although the Merokeety was more of an Oatmeal than ivory. So neither company does great with muted colors. The fibers in the Merokeety feel better to the touch and on the skin compared to Anrabess. I also dont like the side slits on the Merokeety BUT it’s a slightly better quality product than the Anrabess and it covered my big round belly better. Overall, you won’t go wrong buying either BUT I’d highly recommend the Merokeety for quality and fit. See pics.
